name: silhouettejs
description: A small JS module for generating text based avatars in SVGs.
author: Utkarsh Dubey <utkarsh.dubey3jan@gmail.com>

scripts.build: microbundle src/index.ts -o ./dist -f modern,umd --target web --raw true  --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.dev: microbundle watch src/index.ts -o ./dist -f modern,umd --target web --raw true  --tsconfig tsconfig.json
